champion_battle_rule_2080_001:
Physical attack moves are powered up for allies
and opponents.
champion_battle_rule_2080_002:
Special attack moves are powered up for allies
and opponents.
champion_battle_rule_2080_003:
At the start of battle, sync move countdowns are
reduced by half.
champion_battle_rule_2080_004:
The allied and opponents’ fields of play start the
battle with physical damage reduction.
champion_battle_rule_2080_005:
The allied and opponents’ fields of play start the
battle with special damage reduction.
champion_battle_rule_2080_006:
Status conditions and other conditions deal
more damage, last longer, and are more likely
to take effect.
champion_battle_rule_2080_007:
The move gauge increases faster for both allies
and opponents.
champion_battle_rule_2080_010:
When a Pokémon faints, Attack, Defense, Sp. Atk,
Sp. Def, and Speed fall for all sync pairs on that
Pokémon’s team.
champion_battle_rule_2090_001:
Field effects created by both allies and opponents
are permanent.
champion_battle_rule_2090_002:
The additional effects of moves used by allies
and opponents are more likely to occur.
champion_battle_rule_2090_003:
Stat-lowering effects have a greater effect than
normal for allies and opponents.
score_attack_battle_rule_5060_001: The amount of HP restored for allies is zero.
score_attack_battle_rule_5060_002:
Reduces the damage allies deal with sync moves
by 80%.
score_attack_battle_rule_5060_003:
Reduces the damage allies deal with physical
attack moves by 80%.
score_attack_battle_rule_5060_004:
Reduces the damage allies deal with special
attack moves by 80%.
score_attack_battle_rule_5060_005: Reduces allies’ move gauge maximum by two.
score_attack_battle_rule_5060_006:
Allies cannot change the weather, terrain,
or zone.
score_attack_battle_rule_5060_007:
The total number of moves opponents need to
use before they can unleash a sync move is
reduced by 3.
score_attack_battle_rule_5060_008:
Allied tech sync pairs’ Attack, Defense, Sp. Atk,
Sp. Def, and Speed are lowered by 80%.
score_attack_battle_rule_5060_009:
Allied strike sync pairs’ Attack, Defense, Sp. Atk,
Sp. Def, and Speed are lowered by 80%.
score_attack_battle_rule_5060_010:
Opponents are immune to status conditions and
won’t flinch, become confused, or
become trapped.
score_attack_battle_rule_5060_011:
Opponents take 80% less damage when they
are unaffected by a status condition
or interference.
damage_challenge_rule_6060_001:
Reduces the damage allies deal with moves
by 80%.
damage_challenge_rule_6060_002:
Reduces the damage allies deal with sync moves
and max moves by 80%.
